data.eml:eml: Late Miocene large mammals from Mahmutgazi, Denizli province, Western Turkey

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Denis Geraards (2017): Late Miocene large mammals from Mahmutgazi, Denizli province, Western Turkey. Neues Jahrbuch für Geologie und Paläontologie-Abhandlungen 284 (3): 241-257, DOI: 10.1127/njgpa/2017/0661, URL: https://www.ingentaconnect.com/content/schweiz/njbgeol/2017/00000284/00000003/art00001
